duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with coordination of extensive calendar management, serving as gatekeeper
Maintain system of organization for expense reporting
Ensure proper prioritization of requests on behalf of principles, determining urgency appropriately and responding to all requests in a timely manner as the primary point of contact
Conduct travel arrangements and booking on a domestic basis
Manage client activities, acting as direct support to principles
Remain available to support Executive Assistant on various projects and document gathering

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration or related field
